title: Aquarius: solo for 2 people
brief_description: Shows how a short ballet style dance performance evolves beginning with the dancer, Sandra Craig, meeting the composer. The film then shows the collaboration between Sandra, the composer, the director/choreographer and finally the male dancer as they create the final product.
description: Shows how a short ballet style dance performance evolves beginning with the dancer, Sandra Craig, meeting the composer. The film then shows the collaboration between Sandra, the composer, the director/choreographer and finally the male dancer as they create the final product.
